Reviews.Content: I was sooo impressed Sorry I didn't write this earlier. I was at this hotel more than a year ago. I was in Florence for a few days to attend a trade show. One day, I realized my beloved (and very valuable) ring was no longer on my finger. I went balistic and started to walk backward looking at every inch of the floor, inquiring the various people I had met during that day whether they had seen the ring, killing myself trying to remember whose hand I had shaken... It was a nightmare for me and everybody else near me. I had lost, or they stole my ring at the show! Then, phisically and mentally exhausted, I decided I should go to the hotel. Back to my room, MY RING WAS ON THE DESK. The woman who cleans the rooms found it and put it in a little white bowl. Of course, I made sure all the woman's superiors at the hotel knew about this miracle of honesty. Today is thankgiving and I am wearing my ring. I wanted to thank all the honest and hardworking people of the world, including the little woman at Tuscany Hotel in Firenze. I wanted to share this with you, too.
Reviews.Author: beatriceughi

Reviews.Content: Lovely holidays Great Hotel       room 2
Reviews.Author: ANGELA,GREECE

Reviews.Content: Beautiful Hotel Stayed here for one night on a Globus Tour. Hotel was very comfortable. We only stayed one night and had done our sightseeing prior to arriving at the hotel. It was about a 5 minute drive from the historic area and we were able to relax for our long drive the next day. Shower was great!!!
Reviews.Author: mrsbz

Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel, very pleasurable stay Stayed here for 1 night in June and is an excellent hotel, the staff are very polite and all speak good English. The room was clean and of a good size. There is limited parking to the side of the hotel, but you can call beforehand and book a place.Asked for a Iron to iron some shirts, but instead they will iron and clean clothing on site. I had to get to a meeting and they ironed the shirt in 15 minutes so I could get to my meeting on time!
Reviews.Author: snowbiker1

Reviews.Content: Perfect choice We just returned from a 4 day trip to Florence and stayed at the Starhotels Tuscany based on the reviews posted on Tripadvisor. We were NOT disappointed. Yes, the hotel is situated further away from the city center than the other choices, but with the free shuttle service, it was still a convenient location. The only problem with the shuttle service is that it services both the Starhotels Tuscany and the Starhotels Michaelangelo and there is only room for 8 passengers at a time. There is only one shuttle that makes the loop all day long (between the two hotels, the airport and the train station), so there is a good chance that there won't be room on the shuttle for you--- however, booking a reservation for a spot on the shuttle will hopefully eliminate that possibility (which you can do by calling the front desk at any time).Otherwise, the hotel is beautifully decorated, clean and comfortable. The front desk staff is helpful and speaks English. The morning breakfast that is included in the price of the room is fair and comparable to the other breakfast services found at other hotels. We did not eat at the hotel restaurant so I can't comment, but the menu looked great (although a bit pricey). We did however, find a WONDERFUL restaurant just around the corner called Mi Amore which we HIGHLY recommend. Mostly filled with locals, the menu is handwritten and only in Italian and changes daily based on what's fresh/available in the market. Oh, and the supermarket located behind the hotel is quite convenient for bottles of water, fruit, snacks, etc.I personally consider myself a hotel snob and have decently high standards for a hotel, and this hotel has met my expectations. I would absolutely stay here again.
Reviews.Author: JNJHERN

Reviews.Content: Good choice in Florence       hotel lobby
Reviews.Author: TravelerFromNV

Reviews.Content: Starhotels Tuscany excellent hotel. Tastefully decorated, excellent beds and blankets, but pillows were terrible. Beautiful room and lobby, and the service excellent. They were very helpful in facilitating reservations and did their job with pride and professionalism.Full-size grocery story just across the street in back.Bus-service right in front with a short ride to the center.Free shuttle service to center/train station also adds great value.Bathroom amenities tasteful and add great value.
Reviews.Author: yollster

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel Stayed here for 5 nights in July. It was great.The rooms are very up market modern with wooden floors, lovely beds and smart bathrooms.The breakfast was buffet style with lots of choice.The hotel has free parking and a free shuttle bus which we used everyday. The was such a great service. We also got the normal bus back from town which stops about 50m from the hotel and is cheap.We paid just over 拢50(鈧?5, $100) per night including breakfast for the two of us which was excellent value for money using expedia - great value for a hotel in Florence.
Reviews.Author: alanfp

Reviews.Content: Clean, modern, quiet Like many others, we wanted a place near the airport for an early AM departure, but also relatively close to the heart of Florence; StarHotels Tuscany was perfect for that. It was a 5-minute taxi ride to the airport, 15-minute bus ride to the Duomo area.The hotel was a bit of a challenge to find (we had an Italian driver at the time). Most of the staff was helpful, though some were not at all interested in helping us. Our room was outstanding: clean, quiet and modern. A choice of six different types of pillows (we were tempted to try them all but quickly settled on a favorite). The best room lighting I have ever encountered, bright and handy. A comfortable bed. A wonderful buy for 150 Euro for a night in Florence.The hotel has a free shuttle that runs on a fixed schedule to the airport and to the downtown area seven times a day. Since our schedule didn't match the hotel shuttle schedule, we opted to ride on the city bus instead. The bus (Number 22) stops directly in front of the hotel and takes you into town or back for 1.20 Euro each way; the bus comes approximately every 15 minutes.This hotel would be a great place to crash for a day if you're just arriving from a long overseas flight. Directly behind the hotel is a large supermarket where you can stock up on things if your suitcases have been delayed (which happens all too often in Florence!).
Reviews.Author: cbchrc

Reviews.Content: Complete lack of customer service I have to write a mixed review. First of, let me say that the hotel is a beautiful modern hotel with very nice, high-end rooms. You will not be disappointed in the rooms. It is not in central Florence, but we picked it for that reason for our last night in Italy because it was closer to the airport and wanted the convenience of not having to drive in to the city to get to the hotel.But...We had trouble finding the hotel. Not the address, we found that, but there was no hotel there. We called several times and they said, yes, that's the correct address, we don't know why you don't see the hotel. Well, what they failed to tell us is that there is a north and south or east and west version of the address. You'd think they would have known this and told us on the phone. So, an hour later we found the hotel.The front desk was very unconcerned that we had trouble getting there and was uninterested to know that there are two addresses of the same number. We thought this info would be of use to them.We had a ton of luggage (for 30 days in Italy) and no one offered to help us with it, We figured there was no bellman since they watched us drag in everything and didn't say a word. Once we got it all in to the lobby, a guy showed up to help. You'd think the desk would have told us to hang on a moment until he was free.Once in the room we discovered that the bed was in the configuration of two individual beds pushed together, but sheeted for two individuals not a couple. This is common in Italy and they simply have to remake the bed for a couple. I asked the woman at the front desk if they could do that for us and the manager overhead us and without even looking at us said to her in Italian, It's already done for two. That was it. We found the housekeepers and they did it for us.The next morning we had a 10:00 am flight out . We had turned in the car the previous night to make the morning less complicated and would just take a cab. We went to the front desk at 7 and asked that they call us a taxi. Without looking up the guy (yet another guy uninterested in helping us with anything) said that it would be difficult because the taxis all went on strike. No concern on his part that we had to get to the airport. I don't even think he looked up. There was an unused shuttle bus outside but no offer to use it for us. I asked them to help us to think of something. I told them I'd pay anyone for a way there, any way. No emotion on their part. Finally, making enough of a fuss, a woman called a friend taxi driver and got him to come and get us. He brought us to the airport and said the strike didn't start until 8 anyway.We went to many hotels in Italy and were always kind to the staff, and even spoke in Italian. We never had a problem anywhere with the people but here. I would not recommend this hotel until they learn about customer service.
Reviews.Author: slobizman

Reviews.Content: Fantastic Hotel In Beautiful Florence This hotel is a modern, super clean, stylish gem on the outskirts of Florence, a wonderful free shuttle was convenient for going into town (10 minute ride) Wonderful service, awesome rooms and amenities and all over great deal... I highly recommend!!
Reviews.Author: AJChicago

Reviews.Content: Great place to be from all the noise This hotel is a great one for those who want peace and quiet. The rooms are beautifully decorated, beds comfy and the free breakfast lovely. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
Reviews.Author: mayday2073

Reviews.Content: lovely hotel Excellent hotel ,a little far from centre but has free shuttle through the day, staff helpful, great place to stay
Reviews.Author: adrian20

Reviews.Content: Excellent but heating problem Beautifully remodeled hotel in very accessible location to downtown-either by bus or taxi. Free parking. Marble/granite bathrooms. High ceilings in the rooms. One of best continental breakfasts of our trip. Front desk helpful and available. Only problem was heat. I always bring along a thermometer/compass on my trips. Both rooms we rented were stuck at 78 degrees forcing us to open windows in January, despite us changing rooms on the 9th floor and completely shutting down heat/cooling. This allowed much noise into room, making one choose between sweltering, or not sleeping well. With the windows closed, it was very quiet and we were on the side not facing the main street. Front desk was not helpful with this problem and housestaff admitted that it was a problem in many rooms. But this was a very beautiful hotel and the interior would be comparative to any 4-5 star hotel in the US.
Reviews.Author: Otolaryngologist

Reviews.Content: fab hotel except for the location fab hotel, clean but on the small side. the location might be a problem to those who prefer to be in the centre of firenze. however, there is a bus stop very close to the hotel that can take you to and from the city centre.
Reviews.Author: drop

Reviews.Content: a great remodel Wonderful new hotel: clean, nice bed, nice linens, quiet as can be.Only downside is a bit hard to find by car so get GOOD directions or you might be lost for hours trying to find it.The staff were helpful though, and depsite being outside of the city a little bit, with the shuttle this is a REAL option for folks looking for value.
Reviews.Author: dougiedd

Reviews.Content: Wonderful Hotel in Florence This was the last hotel my husband and I stayed at before returning home. I decided to stay here because of an early flight out of FLR airport. We had stayed at another hotel which was closer to the center of Florence and all the sights. After staying at this hotel, I wished I had stayed here during my visit to Florence. The room was very nice. It was a large room with lots of lighting, chairs and large tv. It had wonderful beds with crisp linens. The bathroom was huge and very clean. The room was facing out to a busy street, but inside the room it was very quiet. The double pane windows worked. The breakfast was wonderful. They had everything! It was served downstairs and set up very nicely. The front desk people were very helpful and all seem to speak English very well. We walked to the center and it was about 30 min. We took a taxi back and that was about 10 euros. I am sure you could take the bus in to town easily. The next time we are in Florence we are staying here, pay less for a hotel and get a whole lot more. With the money you are saving on the hotel you can afford to take a taxi. A great hotel in Florence!
Reviews.Author: isoyhappy

Reviews.Content: Nice and Modern We stayed for 5 nights at this hotel in Sept. 7 2006. Location was perfect because it was about 2 miles from the city center. The hotel provides a shuttle service to the city center. At times we used the city bus line number 22 which you can also pick up in front of the hotel and stops in the city center, it runs until midnight. The staff at the hotel was very helpful . We had written in advance for a non-smoking room and the highest floor available and we were granted both.The hotel room itself is very modern and clean. The room of course is small, like in a lot of european hotels,but comfortable. There was breakfast included in the price we paid...which included eggs, bacon, fruits, pastries and bread. There is also a supermarket behind the hotel which is good for waters..wines...etc... I would stay again !!!
Reviews.Author: VillaL

Reviews.Content: Cool, Clean and Courteous I recently needed a hotel in Florence near the airport and booked a night at StarHotel Tuscany. (They have another hotel in the center of town called the Michelangelo.) I could not have been more pleased with my stay. The hotel was new and beautifully appointed for the price. They have free shuttle service from the train station to both of the hotels , which I used -the van is air conditioned- nice in summer. Their shuttle does take you to the airport though didn't begin service as early as I needed to go. That meant I needed a taxi- the taxi drivers were on strike (!) so the helpful and courteous staff arranged a private van for the 10 guests at the hotel needing to go to the airport first thing in the morning for a small , reasonable fee. I loved this hotel and will definitely stay again.
Reviews.Author: IsabellaG

Reviews.Content: Very smart little place I'll keep it short n sweet:It's close to the airport but the hotel bus makes town seem very near.Breakfast was great but the hotel resturant wasnt all that.We went for a superior room and it was very large and the bathroom was too. Lovely supermarket behind the hotel to buy food for back home!Good hotel if you ask me...
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel - recommend warmly! Wonderful hotel, beautiful rooms, great staff, tasty breakfast and more importantly fantastic price and private hotel shuttle service that goes into Florence every half hour!!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel, excellent service I've just returned from a 5 day stay at the Starhotel Tuscany with a group of 70 people. The hotel is beautifully, stylishly and tastefully decorated throughout and is kept in a pristine condition at all times. The staff were extremely polite and courteous at all times and offered an excellent service. Nothing was too much trouble for them. I would like to 'single out' several staff-members for what I considered to be outstanding service . . . Maria (and the team) at Reception, Salvatore (the barman), Alex (the Navetta (shuttle-bus) driver) Eddi, Daniele(and other) porters and the Camerieri. When one is part of such a large group and the staff remember your name, that's impressive and many of the staff at this Hotel greeted me by name on a daily basis!I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel and would certainly want to return there!
Reviews.Author: stefano

Reviews.Content: Don't even think of staying here Due to a complete mess in our booking, we were bumped into the StarHotel Monginevro. It's on a main dual carriageway in Northern Florence. The lobby is just the start of the horrors -  if they can't maintain the lobby, imagine how bad the rooms are.Having seen the rooms, we refused to stay  ended up paying twice as much to stay at another hotel in Florence. The reception staff  porter were very helpful, but couldn't make up for the fact that this hotel is a complete dump.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: And this is four star? If the Monginevro is a four star hotel, a two star must be a barnyard. The disheveled lobby and front desk are a look of things to come. My room had shredded carpet and a saggy bed, along with curtains fixed with duct tape.The hot in the complimentary breakfast must refer to the lukewarm eggs, yogurt, and juice.The saving grace was that the staff arranged a reservation at the Uffuzi galleries so that I could avoid the line there (and spend more time in my glorious room, perhaps?)
Reviews.Author: E-TripCalifornia
